name: @gamely/gly-cli
author: RodrigoDornelles
description: A Lua-based command-line interface for managing GLY game engine projects.

scripts.step4: bun build --entrypoint npm/gly-cli/cli.ts --target node --format cjs --outfile dist/cli.js --minify
scripts.prestep5: npx gly-cli meta source/cli/main.lua --format 'version={{ meta.version }}' > dist/cli.version
scripts.step5: npx gly-cli meta package.json dist/cli.version --format '{{& dump.raw.json}}' > dist/package.json
scripts.step6: echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' > dist/cli.header && mkdir -p dist/bin && cat dist/cli.header dist/cli.js > dist/bin/cli.js && rm dist/cli.* && mv dist/bin/cli.js dist && rmdir dist/bin
scripts.step7: npx gly-cli fs-replace README.md ./dist/README.md --format 'lua cli.lua' --replace 'npx gly-cli'
scripts.build: npm run step1 && npm run step2 && npm run step3 && npm run step4 && npm run step5 && npm run step6 && npm run step7 && npm run step8 && npm run step9
